mapper.insert: insert into t_order_item(order_id, order_number, product_id, product_pic, product_name, product_price, product_quantity, delivery_type, tracking_number) values (#{orderItem.orderId}, #{orderItem.orderNumber}, #{orderItem.productId}, #{orderItem.productPic}, #{orderItem.productName}, #{orderItem.productPrice}, #{orderItem.productQuantity}, #{orderItem.deliveryType}, #{orderItem.trackingNumber});
mapper.select: select order_item_id, order_id, order_number, product_id, product_pic, product_name, product_price, product_quantity, delivery_type, tracking_number, delete_status from t_order_item where delete_status = 0 and order_id = #{orderId}
